title: Tanah Lot Temple & Coastal Wonders (Half-day)
overview: A scenic journey to Bali's iconic sea temple, with time for coastal exploration and sunset views.

stops.description: Arrive at Tanah Lot Temple, explore the temple grounds, and learn about its history.
Browse local souvenirs and snacks at the market near the temple.
Find a spot on the cliffs for a spectacular sunset view over the Indian Ocean.

title: Bali’s West Coast & Tanah Lot (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Bali’s west coast, including Tanah Lot Temple, rice terraces, and a sunset dinner by the sea.

stops.description: Stop at Seseh Beach for a morning stroll on the black sand and ocean breeze.
Visit the UNESCO-listed Jatiluwih Rice Terraces for a scenic walk and photo opportunities.
Enjoy a Balinese lunch with rice terrace views.
Explore Tanah Lot Temple and its dramatic sea setting.
Relax with a drink and watch the sunset over the temple.
